name: SAP National Security Services
short_description: The SAP National Security Services (SAP NS2) Federal Secure Node delivers the Success Factors HCM Suite SaaS for the Federal Community.
long_description: The SAP National Security Services (SAP NS2) Federal Secure Node delivers the Success Factors HCM Suite SaaS for the Federal Community.  The SuccessFactors HCM Suite includes a complete set of tightly integrated talent management solutions, robust workforce analytics and planning, plus a next generation core HR solution. This Software as a Service (SaaS) solution is delivered by SAP NS2.
